name: Blade & Fang
description:
Grab your weapon and parry your way to victory in this first-person boss rush game. Play as the wielder of Boris the Soulblade and charge up the sword's magical powers by parrying devastating attacks. Fail and you die.

This game is a short prototype made during an internal game jam as a team exercise. The game designer specifically asked for a parry mechanic, so here we are.

If you like the game and want to follow the team behind it, check out our Discord: https://discord.gg/EYrqE3Q

Controls:

- WASD: Move around!
Yes, you have legs.

- Space: Jump!
You can even double-jump!

- RMB/Right-click: Parry!
Successful parries charge up your sword.

- LMB/Left-click: Swing your sword!
If your sword is fully charged, launch a damaging projectile.
